name: Ardeny 1944
overview: Ardeny 1944 is a Polish language two-player tactical turn-based strategy game with elements of strategy board games, similar to the Panzer General series. The game is set during the World War II. The players take command of Allied and German forces during the Ardennes Offensive in December 1944. The game is divided into turns, such as construction of fortifications, replenishment of troops, movement of troops, attack on enemy units.
